infoShort: The Firewire Chumlee is an hybrid surfboard short and wide with a compact outline.
info: The Firewire Chumlee is an hybrid surfboard short and wide with a compact outline. It´s an evolution of the Baked Potato, with more rocker and less width. You can surf in small and weak waves like a shorboard.Grade B: Board with a slight yellow hue.
